entry.source: 〉 The room is filled with an eerie{F801}silence.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The room is filled with an eerie{F801}silence.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Where will you go?{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Where will you go?{F801}

entry.source: The underground shelter ruins{F801}The Domain{F801}
entry.target: The underground shelter ruins{F801}The Domain{F801}

entry.source: 〉 There is no need to head deeper in{F801}anymore...{F801}{F802}〉 You head back to the ruins of the{F801}underground shelter.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 There is no need to head deeper in{F801}anymore...{F801}{F802}〉 You head back to the ruins of the{F801}underground shelter.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 You sense no one here. The area is{F801}filled with silence...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You sense no one here. The area is{F801}filled with silence...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A giant temple is before you...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A giant temple is before you...{F801}

entry.source: Enter{F801}Leave{F801}
entry.target: Enter{F801}Leave{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Brawny man\0{F87A,53}{F813,0,135001}...You have come, my brother. Lady{F801}Yuriko knows all.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Brawny man\0{F87A,53}{F813,0,135001}...You have come, my brother. Lady{F801}Yuriko knows all.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Brawny man\0{F87A,53}{F813,0,135002}We caught an intruder... Some punk{F801}from the Ashura-kai.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Brawny man\0{F87A,53}{F813,0,135002}We caught an intruder... Some punk{F801}from the Ashura-kai.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Brawny man\0{F87A,53}{F813,0,135003}I'm on patrol, so I can't escort you,{F801}but don't keep Lady Yuriko waiting.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Brawny man\0{F87A,53}{F813,0,135003}I'm on patrol, so I can't escort you,{F801}but don't keep Lady Yuriko waiting.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The brawny man leaves...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The brawny man leaves...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Glaring man\0{F87A,46}{F813,0,135005}Because you took so long... Mr. Tayama{F801}sent us instead...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Glaring man\0{F87A,46}{F813,0,135005}Because you took so long... Mr. Tayama{F801}sent us instead...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Glaring man\0{F87A,46}{F813,0,135006}Y... You can't get in from the front.{F801}But under... the bench...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,135007}There's... a manhole... Open it...{F801}and a hidden pa...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Glaring man\0{F87A,46}{F813,0,135006}Y... You can't get in from the front.{F801}But under... the bench...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,135007}There's... a manhole... Open it...{F801}and a hidden pa...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The glaring man collapsed with his{F801}eyes wide open...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The glaring man collapsed with his{F801}eyes wide open...{F801}

entry.source: Head inside{F801}Head to the bench{F801}Leave{F801}
entry.target: Head inside{F801}Head to the bench{F801}Leave{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The gate is tightly closed.{F801}It doesn't seem like you can{F801}go any further...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The gate is tightly closed.{F801}It doesn't seem like you can{F801}go any further...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 There is a manhole cover under{F801}the bench...{F801}{F802}〉 It seems tightly sealed.{F801}You don't think you can open it...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 There is a manhole cover under{F801}the bench...{F801}{F802}〉 It seems tightly sealed.{F801}You don't think you can open it...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,51}{F813,1,404303}We have closed off that entrance.{F801}Not a single vile rat will survive.{F801}{F802}If you wish to meet Lady Yuriko,{F801}enter through the front gates.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,51}{F813,1,404303}We have closed off that entrance.{F801}Not a single vile rat will survive.{F801}{F802}If you wish to meet Lady Yuriko,{F801}enter through the front gates.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} opens the manhole cover{F801}underneath the bench...{F801}{F802}〉 {F843,0} climbs down the ladder{F801}and enters Tsukiji Hongwanji.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} opens the manhole cover{F801}underneath the bench...{F801}{F802}〉 {F843,0} climbs down the ladder{F801}and enters Tsukiji Hongwanji.{F801}

entry.source: Head inside{F801}Head to the bench{F801}Leave{F801}
entry.target: Head inside{F801}Head to the bench{F801}Leave{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A man in the Ring of Gaea stands{F801}in the way...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A man in the Ring of Gaea stands{F801}in the way...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F813,1,404311}{F87A,53}Ah, you have arrived. Welcome,{F801}brother. There is no need for{F801}explanation; I know why you are here.{F801}{F802}Lady Yuriko awaits your arrival.{F801}...Come with me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F813,1,404311}{F87A,53}Ah, you have arrived. Welcome,{F801}brother. There is no need for{F801}explanation; I know why you are here.{F801}{F802}Lady Yuriko awaits your arrival.{F801}...Come with me.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} and Walter followed the{F801}man...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} and Walter followed the{F801}man...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} and Walter were led to{F801}a room with two pillars.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} and Walter were led to{F801}a room with two pillars.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A man in the Ring of Gaea stands{F801}in the way...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A man in the Ring of Gaea stands{F801}in the way...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,53}Lady Yuriko should have already{F801}told you that now is the time to{F801}release the gates to the Expanse...{F801}{F802}Now, my brother, you must go{F801}quickly to Camp Ichigaya...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ring of Gaea member\0{F87A,53}Lady Yuriko should have already{F801}told you that now is the time to{F801}release the gates to the Expanse...{F801}{F802}Now, my brother, you must go{F801}quickly to Camp Ichigaya...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400005}That bench over there... I see a hole{F801}under it. It seems to lead underground...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400005}That bench over there... I see a hole{F801}under it. It seems to lead underground...{F801}
